analysis.description:
FloraFicTokenCrowdsale._getTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#408-427) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Crowdsale.rate

FloraFicTokenCrowdsale.getCurrentRate (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#402-408) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Crowdsale.rate

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#242-244) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#244)

FloraFicTokenCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(wallet,amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol)

FloraFicTokenCrowdsale.setClosingTime (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#396-401) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_closingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#397-399)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#86-96) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#102-103) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#103-104) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.transfer (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#104-107) should be declared external
ERC20.allowance (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#115-116) should be declared external
ERC20.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#116-117) should be declared external
ERC20.approve (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#117-120) should be declared external
FinalizableCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#359-369) should be declared external
FloraFicTokenCrowdsale.setClosingTime (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#396-401) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/25/0xd04b24bec50f12200a65c3eb821c7b2c6b56fb3e.sol#1): it allows old versions
